channel.title: ≤σ≤ how do you make a source? δäδ
channel.description:
ok,I really need help on making a source because I'm tired of using other sources, that are really cool or so,and I really like some sources,but I really need to make one, because I would really, like to make my own because I would like for others to download my source and so they would like,to play my cool source for other's to play so if you can post the links for me to follow and so I can make a source please and thanks.
Thanks,Colgi

item.title: ≤σ≤ how do you make a source? δäδ
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

HAHA…

You’re not capable of making a source, as it seems you know nothing of Java or other languages.

Get somebody else’s source, like Czar, and go from there. All sources right now are based off of winterlove’s original.

Read full topic

item.title: ≤σ≤ how do you make a source? δäδ
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

after recently creating the base of one, i can tell you it is VERY easy.

make these files:

misc.java
client.java
server.java
playerhandler.java
player.java
stream.java

program them correctly.

you’re sorted.

advance on them.

remember to try & catch every method.

Read full topic
item.source: ≤σ≤ how do you make a source? δäδ

item.title: ≤σ≤ how do you make a source? δäδ
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You make a file and call it what you want and theres your source.

Read full topic
